subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Musketeers improved to 18-2 over all and 6-2 in the Big East after staving off a rally by the Friars (17-4, 5-3), who had beaten No. 6 Villanova in their last game.
snippet: The Musketeers improved to 18-2 over all and 6-2 in the Big East after staving off a rally by the Friars (17-4, 5-3), who had beaten No. 6 Villanova in their last game.
